website_summaries.verdict: Thick latex balloons are strong enough for any kid's party.
pros: Safe to fill with air, helium, or water
Multicolor balloons have an aesthetically pleasing metallic finish
Thick latex is durable and can withstand child play
Balloons don’t leak air or water and stay inflated for days
cons: Not all balloons are uniform in shape

customer_reviews.title: surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a surprised birthday and it was perfect! It is exactly as described. Metallic color is nice. I recommend this product and would purchase more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Yu

customer_reviews.title: Very Goof
customer_reviews.text: Balloons color are chrome, same as what it show on advertise, good deco for party and my guests love it.
customer_reviews.author: ZZ cool

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what some of the reviews meant by no metallic balloons or a dull shade but these babies are adorable! They are for a photo shoot of mine, and I can’t wait to see them in action! Quick shipping too!Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Trish Yonts

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: These where really good balloons, just a few things i was a lil disappointed in was their not as platinum as I thought and a couple of them had holes. But they are very strong
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the metallic multi color pack of 50 balloons, and they were beautiful. Used them for a space themed party, and each balloon was shiny and durable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and really pretty
customer_reviews.text: The best quality balloon I’ve ever had. I blew these up for multiple sons birthday on January 20 and they’re still flying high! Beautiful metallic colors!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Brought these balloons for birthday party. Was big and shinny, great for party or any events.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed 🙏

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The balloons looks fabulous, good quality and bright colors, exactly the way it was described. Great prices and got here on time.
customer_reviews.author: Mepe

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. The chrome is not really chrome/metallic. It’s more a darker latex. There were bubbles and white spots on several. They didn’t blow up to a norma balloon shape. They look like eggplant. Wouldn’t recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t buy these again. They all blow up in random shapes. A few popped when blowing or ripped. I feel like they were really old balloons and they were dusty
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: These are the worst!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! They keep popping as I’m trying to blow them up, there’s weird powder inside of then, and the ones that don’t pop are really strange shaped. Just printed my return label.😫
customer_reviews.author: Amber Remillard

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These are nice balloons, a good size and fairly thick. However the colors and finish are not at all what is being advertised. They have a much more matte finish with just a slight gloss. In the photo being advertised they appear to have a high shine, with much more vibrant colors. I was also disappointed that the colors were not more varied. We only had one blue and a couple purple and grey. The majority were green and gold. Overall disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: N. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your time or money. The balloons aren't metallic, it was actually more dusty looking. I was upset to see the day of my event when I went to blow them up I had more gold then any other color. It was only 2 purple, two green and like 4 of silver, blue. I took a chance based off some of the photos I seen in the reviews but I wasnt happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: not shiny like the image
customer_reviews.text: the balloons dont shine like the image they are very doll and mate disappointed with the product can't return it I need it for this weekend
customer_reviews.author: Juan P.

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT Metallic
customer_reviews.text: These balloons are not metallic. They are not bright and cannot be returned. They look nothing like the picture!
customer_reviews.author: JessiKa

customer_reviews.title: Popping Balloons!
customer_reviews.text: These balloons are absolutely beautiful! Too bad they do not last. They pop very easily; they pop while you are blowing them up, tying on ribbon, displaying, sharing. They pop when you look at them, and when you breathe. Behold their beauty quickly, and don't plan to use them for a party. They will leave you deflated.
customer_reviews.author: Hilde

customer_reviews.title: Defective! They mostly pop within the first thirty minutes
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely not worth it! Don’t spend your money on these. The colors are not shiny. The colors are dull. And when you blow them up you can see little circles here and there. Most of the balloons will pop within the first thirty minutes upon inflating. Keep it moving sis
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality and color flat and not metallic. Also the seller should specify that these balloons can’t withstand heat and sun. After an hour in the sun they were popping like crazy like fireworks. About 15 out of the 50 popped loudly. We had to bring them inside because the kids and elderly were getting scared. I have purchased many balloons from other sellers and never ever had them pop one after the other for no reason. Also, the balloons have a strange coating powder on them. My hands were so dirty after blowing them up. I will be contacting Amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I spent all night blowing up a Garland. The colors were nice, and balloons were thick. It stood all night, in the spare room. As soon as I brought the Garland out to the deck, they began popping. Within minutes the Garland was ruined, and we had about 8 remaining ( deflated) balloons for the party. Thank goodness I also purchased Mylar balloons, or we would not have had any decor for my aunts 86th bday. All I can assess, is that it was 72 degrees that day, and the balloons don't like heat. Note, they were never in direct sun.
customer_reviews.author: a. ameden

customer_reviews.title: These are nice quality balloons
customer_reviews.text: They are very metallic and can blow up quite large without popping because they are good quality. There are so many balloons in 1 package that it will take me several parties to go through them all. The green, gray and gold balloons could be used for a Jurassic World birthday party, and the pink and purple for a princess birthday party. Other ideas would be New Years or a graduation party for the gold and silver balloons.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!! READ REVIEW!!
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. They are not at all shiny as the picture portrays. Several popped while inflating. Several popped several minutes after being inflated. (Did not over-inflate any) They have a foul chemical smell and are covered in a fine powdery film which causes and unusual feal on yours hands. These things are probably toxic. Made in... you guessed it, China.
customer_reviews.author: dmb41

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful balloons, not helium compatible
customer_reviews.text: The balloons are beautiful, love the matte finish. Filled them up with helium at the variety store. That gorgeous summer evening the balloons clung to the ceiling like their lives depended on it. In the morning the balloons were on the ground, a pale shadow of their former selves. They also released a ton of helium, going flat a 2 days later. You can see in the photos how the helium balloons looked compared to the balloons I blew up with my high quality lung air. The lung balloons remained beautifully poignant whilst the helium balloons lost their humble form overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Yuval Ramos

customer_reviews.title: 😡😡
customer_reviews.text: These are regular balloons not metallic, just got them and returning them,be honest to your customers and put the proper description of your products so people can decide if they want it of look for what they really need because you wasted my time with your false advertisement.. hopefully I can get it before the event.
customer_reviews.author: joey-ann condell

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, but can't handle electric pump!
customer_reviews.text: Quite disappointed! I bought these for a NYE party. The colors are nice however half of them popped while blowing up and atleast 2 deflated on there own within an hour despite being tied. Granted, we did use an electric pump, but I still don't think they were that durable and Im glad we didn't waste helium instead. We ended uo having to buy regular balloons from walmart to supplement!
customer_reviews.author: Tdlaw

customer_reviews.title: Half of them were defective!
customer_reviews.text: There were about 1/3 with holes, the rest of the balloons popped with a crazy sound! I wanted to decorate my house, but it turned out to be a scary movie for my family and my animals, as the balloons started to pop within the first hour, scaring everyone! Waste of time and money! Аmazon won't let me give one star, covering all defective stuff with fulfilment, so I put 2 stars, but you know!
customer_reviews.author: Ole

customer_reviews.title: Not as shiny, very pretty though, does not hold the helium in for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Not as shiny as the picture, When blowing these balloons most of them had holes in it and it does not hold the air for a long time. Got a professional helium tank and the helium last it less than nine hours in those balloons so the latex on those balloons are not the greatest so if you choose to use these balloons blow it up a couple hours before your function so they don’t fall down
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Casillas

customer_reviews.title: Good but....
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and shiny, but be careful. If you handle them, the shininess dims pretty quickly. Maybe if you handle them with gloves instead of using your fingers, that would t be an issue? Not sure but be careful if the shininess is important to you.
customer_reviews.author: Cool cat

customer_reviews.title: Shiny and durable
customer_reviews.text: They really look great. Nice shine. I popped a couple when they had just been inflated but once they were blown up for a while, they were surprisingly durable. 3 have been bouncing around for a month. One even have a two year old bouncing on it without bursting.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Breeden

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The colors (balloons on the ground) are perfect! Just as described. Sadly the package had about 6 balloons that already had holes in them and the rest we blew up were excellent, but were easy to pop. Probably would not but at this price again due to the balloons that already had holes(which I have actually never gotten before) and the lack of the advertised durability.
customer_reviews.author: Jeszyka

customer_reviews.title: Not metallic!
customer_reviews.text: They basically just look like pastel balloons once they’re blown up. Not shiny, opaque, or metallic like the picture shows. And don’t pump too much or they explode! Otherwise, they do the basic job of holding air for at least a week so there’s that.
customer_reviews.author: Rheymamma

customer_reviews.title: Not shiny.
customer_reviews.text: Takes alot of helium to float. Great size. Not very shiny. It more like a pale color. Stayed up for hours. But I liked them. A few popped easily while putting air in it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: 10% didn't work
customer_reviews.text: In blowing up the balloons the colors weren't evenly distributed across which colors were included. I got a lot more gold than I wanted to put in my arrangement. Also a few of the balloons came with holes in them and wouldn't blow up at all. I would say that 10% of the balloons didn't even work. They also didn't hold air very well. I blew them up two days before my event and they had already started deflating less than 48 hours later. I wouldn't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty pearl colors. Bigger and thicker than typical balloons. None busted while blowing up. Lasted 24 hours before we intentionally busted them. (Fyi This picture shows pearl mixed with Walmart balloons.)
customer_reviews.author: HLenz

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit!
customer_reviews.text: I got these balloons filled at my local party store and the employees said every customer who walked in asked where they were from!! They were AWESOME. Very vibrant and lasted a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Small hole in balloons
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had a good deal. However when I opened up the balloons and started to blow them up there was a tiny hole in the balloons so it was a waste. I didn’t start to blow them up until the day of my 40th so I couldn’t use all the balloons nor could I run out and get more. I was truly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: QUEENBEE4

customer_reviews.title: Keep away from sun!
customer_reviews.text: Keep away from elements and they will look great. Unfortunately I had them in direct sunlight and within the hour the metallic sheen disappeared. The balloons became covered in a "cloudy" sheen.
customer_reviews.author: R. Howell

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I once sold balloons so I feel good in saying these were a high-quality latex with a supurb color. They last a long time blown up, hold helium well. Very please with them.
customer_reviews.author: Love2read

customer_reviews.title: Pretty ballons
customer_reviews.text: I really like the balloons but the package did not contain a good variety of the colors I got more of the colors I wouldn’t even have used, And they are not as metallic as they seem in the picture on the website
customer_reviews.author: MIke Hammock

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: We bought party balloons to celebrate the birthday but most of the balloons got burst before party even started. So most of the balloons got burst (40 out of 48) to be precise. Balloons looked really good but we dont buy balloons just for an hour. really disappointed with the quality of these balloons.
customer_reviews.author: abhishek

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in color
customer_reviews.text: I thought these balloons would look more like the picture
customer_reviews.author: retrat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but deceptive!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these balloons for my 8 year old grandsons birthday party. We stayed up after he went to bed, the night before his celebration. They were beautiful, but we noticed that an unusual amount of them popped and broke as we were blowing them up and we were not over inflating them. Then all night long some of them continued to break and pop jarring us from our sleep. sooo annoying! I will never buy these again and advise you all to do the same!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rena Cromwell

customer_reviews.title: Great Balloons
customer_reviews.text: Colors are great - I wiped them with a microfiber cloth prior to inflating to get a little powder off of them. They are more matte metallic than shiny and that was perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and modern
customer_reviews.text: They are really pretty and durable. They last for months if not filled to their full capacity. They started bursting in the birthday party after sometime due to that.
customer_reviews.author: Qazi

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Around half of the balloons that I blew up exploded. Most while I was blowing them up and only partially full. Others shortly after stringing them. Also left metallic residue on my hands. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: JOSH

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as picture
customer_reviews.text: But you cant see the thickness that's there, but it is and its makes them good quality! P.s. stretch before filling with air for ease
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R walters

customer_reviews.title: Meh.  Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not really as advertised. I was looking for metallic balloons and even though they are slightly metallic, I was looking for shinier balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Yanahan

customer_reviews.title: Very unique
customer_reviews.text: Quite a few of them were damaged but we had plenty anyway. They are thick and very colorful. The kids loved them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: They look absolutely beautiful. All the balloons have great shine. They pop a little too easily otherwise they are exactly same as shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Anchla

customer_reviews.title: Same as the picture
customer_reviews.text: The real thing, you won’t get disappointed with these balloons since what you get in the picture is what you get. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Attention grabbing beautiful balloons
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful balloons. They definitely grab attention. Pretty durable. They are more expensive than normal balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: helium
customer_reviews.text: ilike how they look they look nice but i needed to buy helium and thats stuff expensive thesw days ya know
customer_reviews.author: i’m cool

customer_reviews.title: THEY DONT FLOAT!
customer_reviews.text: Did not realize these balloons do not float,, lol! The kids were disappointed. Buy helium instead.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.R. Tony R.

customer_reviews.title: Low quality latex. Metallic paint comes off.
customer_reviews.text: Pop easily outdoors when filled with helium. The metallic paint comes off to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ottieno

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: Got tons of compliments on the balloons at the store I had them blown up. It's been 6 days and they're still floating!
customer_reviews.author: YippieHippie

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these balloons, they do not stay shiny chrome but they still look amazing! Did a balloon design 2 weeks ago and it still looks fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya L.

customer_reviews.title: As described.  Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: They are as pictured Happy with this purchase. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love the balloons they were great quality. Only thing I was upset about was that the pack only came with 1 purple balloon i had to improvise and use other purple balloons . I was really hoping to have purple metallic ones to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Balloons popped too easily
customer_reviews.text: Many of these balloons popped much too easily even though I didn't over fill them with air. I am unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Not too metallic.
customer_reviews.text: These were noce balloons but they werent as metallic as I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Srbig19

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look of these balloons! They look like floating metal Spears! They last a very long time. But they start to lose their color if exspose to the sun
customer_reviews.author: DENISE JONES

customer_reviews.title: Not shiny like real chrome balloons
customer_reviews.text: I like these balloons but they are not chrome balloons I bought chrome balloons before and they were a lot more shiny then these. the 2nd pic is real chrome balloons
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Contained holes....
customer_reviews.text: These were pretty but about a quarter of them had two big holes in them and all the pink ones popped immediately when we tried to blow them up. Wouldnt t buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Balloons are not shiny just plain regular balloons they do hold the helium a little longer but I'll go with dollar store balloons before I buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: ADAM HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Very colorful
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves the colors especially when used for their birthdays at the office. Good size too.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Mutable in the bag had holes before I even got to blow them up.. any I tried to fill with helium popped so I responded to just blowing up maybe 10 that didn’t pop
customer_reviews.author: KCrupi

customer_reviews.title: Matte
customer_reviews.text: These were great and HUGE but they were not as shiny-metallic as the photo. Definitely more matte.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail whit

customer_reviews.title: Not as shinny
customer_reviews.text: Not as shinny as the picture and a lot of ballons were broken or deflated slowly after a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Luvblue21

customer_reviews.title: Pearl - not metallic
customer_reviews.text: These are pearl, not metallic. They also didn’t hold up very well - sinking after only 6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Cooks

customer_reviews.title: Happy birthday
customer_reviews.text: Very good balloons. Holding up pretty well for 4 year old to play with. Nice colors
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Shiny and Big
customer_reviews.text: The kids really like these balloons because they're extra shiny and they blow up bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy J

customer_reviews.title: Don’t blow them up too much because they will pop.
customer_reviews.text: People loved them and they looked great. I only wish they would of had more blue, green and purple color Balloons. But in all I was very happy. Little advice don’t blow them up too much because they will pop. I had 6 pop on me. Remember to use a balloon buddy.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Olivera

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the quality and size. Color assortment was disappointing. I would have preferred equal amounts of each color balloon.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great balloons, not a good mix of colors
customer_reviews.text: The balloons were sturdy and had a nice smooth texture so it didn't tear up my fingers to tie up 50 of them. However, in the bag there was only one pink and two green balloons. It was mostly silver and gold, which was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Holes
customer_reviews.text: We used these to decorate work stations in our office. Although the colors are great and just as described, about 1/3 of the balloons contain random holes which was very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: roy

customer_reviews.title: These are the coolest balloons.
customer_reviews.text: These are even prettier in person. Love the look!! Will defiy buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Not as shiny
customer_reviews.text: Super pretty although it’s NOT as shiny as in the photo
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but don’t touch them, metallic runs off
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty balloons but the metallic rubs off. I purchased these balloons for my son and the balloons metallic finish rubbed off all over his face.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Marie Lee

customer_reviews.title: To check ballons for holes
customer_reviews.text: Got these ballons, beautiful colors. Only of the 50 ballons 20 of them had small holes that you couldn't tell until you blow them up and pop. Could not sent any if them back 5 of them had big holes. I would like to order again but ! Don't know. It was for a birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Gorritz

customer_reviews.title: Not shiny
customer_reviews.text: These balloons did not look like the photo. They aren't shiny or metallic. Otherwise, they are strong...
customer_reviews.author: Carina Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I wish i had option less than 1 star. Pretty but extremely cheap quality
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: metallic look goes away in the sun and they only lasted about an hour
customer_reviews.text: These are probably really pretty for indoor use, but not ourdoor. some of the balloons came smaller than others and the metallic effect gets effected by heat and the shine goes away leaving an ugly washed out color. The helium did not last long in these balloons as well...only for about an hour. disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisette

customer_reviews.title: No air
customer_reviews.text: The balloons appeared old. They were mostly stuck closed. They had to be opened prior to blow up
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend these balloons.. Opening was too large to inflate on a helium tank. lost more air trying to fill them. For balloons, not the greatest. I didn't end up using them for the party. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Al M.

customer_reviews.title: Unique balloons
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool balloons! We got the metallic ones for a galaxy birthday party. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Julielle

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these balloons they just keep popping with out even touching them, They are cheap & garbage
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I have order some before that were a tad bid better in quality but these defiantly get the job done!!
customer_reviews.author: Dani Dearest Decor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality balloons! Thick and durable. The colors are not as shiny as on the pictures but very rich, not see through at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Heavy metal
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors. Great for coworkers birthdays and other celebrations.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Photos are deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Ultimately got the job done but as you can see in my photo they are not nearly as "shiny" or metallic as they appear to be in the advertised photo.
customer_reviews.author: Joslyn Leary

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful at first them they faded the metallic didn’t stay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Everybingle one of these balloons popped within 10 minutes of being inflated. I managed to keep 3 inflated that were filled to under 1/3 of their capacity. Absolut garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE METALLIC BALLOONS
customer_reviews.text: These balloons are awesome! They were perfect for my daughter's galaxy theme birthday party. Would defunitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Marble

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for a party themed teal and gold. There were plenty of gold balloons but only 1 teal in the whole package. Many arrived with holes and we had to throw out quite a few of the balloons. Also, not as metallic as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Brienne R.

customer_reviews.title: good but not metallic color like the picture
customer_reviews.text: color looked nice, I still would buy more next time
customer_reviews.author: Elyy

customer_reviews.title: The product
customer_reviews.text: The balloons were not as shown o the colour as per the picture it was suppose to be multi color onstead we receive only one colour balloons...will return
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Irfan Ali

customer_reviews.title: Not metallic and poor quality! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: The balloons are nothing like pictured. They are a dull color covered in dull silver dust that comes off if anyone handles them or rubs against them. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Hinesley

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured, read my review
customer_reviews.text: Not as pictured. They do not look like shiny metalic balloons
customer_reviews.author: Scott Peraza

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! So much prettier than the traditional latex balloons
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: NOT chrome like the picture.
customer_reviews.text: The picture is misleading. They are metallic, but NOT chrome.
customer_reviews.author: Linda mewis

customer_reviews.title: Dirty Balloons!!!
customer_reviews.text: The balloons are the most filthiest I’ve ever seen. My hand was dusty after blowing up one ballon. Then you have all that dirt all over your home. I can’t believe this is an amazon choice product. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Leila

product_meta.title: Pukavt Party Balloons 12inch 50pcs Assorted Color Metallic Latex Balloons Birthday Helium Balloons
feature_bullets: New Style Balloons 12": Beautiful balloons in assorted color to make your party most memorable.The metallic color of latex balloons are new, fresh style perfect for birthday party, wedding party, christmas party and other party decoration.

Premium Quality Party Balloons: 12 inch party balloons are made in quality latex which safe to use around children.The color of balloons are shiny and chrome which are perfect deocrations in kids party. Each of these latex balloon is 3.2g weight, which is in brighter color and 20% thicker than normal latex balloons.
Package Include: Party latex balloons set include 50 party balloons of metallic chrome assorted color.The best color for your party.

Balloons Can Be Fill With: Metallic balloons can be fill wiht air, helium and water.About 2 days when party balloons filled with air;3-6 hours when filled helium in latex balloons. Unique design balloons for party.

Warning: Color of sliver balloons will be a certain difference before and after balloons is inflated. Please don't overfill the balloon and avoid sunburn or overheat.Balloons are suitable for children over 8 years old.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars932 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
